info.title: JP Fan App API
info.description: This document was generated from the branch master.

post.description:
Login with Username + Password.
The generated `string` is the authentication token which is needed for authenticated routes: Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN>

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

DOESN'T revoke existing tokens

get.description:
platform: - iOS: 0 - Android: 1
isTestDevice: when set to true, the notifications will be sent via to the sandbox servers. Only iPhones built via Xcode receive those notifications. Default is false and can only be updated authenticate via setTestDevice

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.description:
Indicates what types of notifiations the user want to receive
entityType: - Video - Manufacturer (not implemented yet) - Model (not implemented yet) - Stage (not implemented yet) - Timing (not implemented yet) - Image (not implemented yet)
entityID: - optional - when null: the user receives notifications for changes on all entities - when set to an id: the user receives notifications only for changes on the specific id
